H.text: A blast occurred at a hotel in Taba.
H.ref: The blast occurred at 10 p.m. at the Taba Hilton, a luxury high-rise hotel on the Red Sea surrounded by palm trees and coral reefs, just a few hundred yards over the border from the southern tip of Israel.

H.text: Three blasts targeted tourist resorts in Sinai.
H.ref: At least 12 people were killed and 135 others injured in three blasts that targeted tourist resorts in Egypt's Sinai Peninsula, the Interior Ministry said in a statement early Friday.

H.text: There were a series of bombings in Sinai.
H.ref: A group calling itself "Islamic Unity Brigades" claimed responsibility Friday for a series of bombings in Egypt's Sinai peninsula targeting Israeli tourists, and which Israel has blamed on Al-Qaeda.

H.text: A car bomb ripped through a hotel on the Red Sea coast of Sinai.
H.ref: Car bombs ripped through a major hotel and two beach resorts packed with Israeli tourists on the Red Sea coast of Egypt's Sinai desert, killing at least 19 people and causing scenes of mayhem in attacks that Israel blamed on Al-Qaeda.

H.text: There was intelligence about a possible attack against Israeli tourists in Sinai.
H.ref: He said there was intelligence about a possible attack against Israeli tourists in Egypt's Sinai, where as many as 12,000 Israelis were traveling for the holidays, according to the Israeli Foreign Ministry.

H.text: A series of bombings targeted Israelis.
H.ref: A group calling itself "Islamic Unity Brigades" claimed responsibility Friday for a series of bombings in Egypt's Sinai peninsula targeting Israeli tourists, and which Israel has blamed on Al-Qaeda.

H.text: The Sinai resorts are popular with vacationing Israelis.
H.ref: Three explosions shook three Egyptian Sinai resorts popular with vacationing Israelis on Thursday night.

H.text: The explosions occurred as Israelis were celebrating the end of a Jewish holiday.
H.ref: The explosions occurred as Israelis were celebrating the end of the Jewish holiday of Sukkot, and followed intelligence warnings that Israelis should keep out of the Sinai because of possible attacks.

H.text: At least 30 people were killed in the blasts.
H.ref: Egypt said at least 30 people were killed _ including 12 Egyptians _ but an Israeli official later said he could confirm only 14 or 15 dead, including five or six Israelis.

H.text: 12 Egyptians were killed in the blasts.
H.ref: Egypt said at least 30 people were killed _ including 12 Egyptians _ but an Israeli official later said he could confirm only 14 or 15 dead, including five or six Israelis.

H.text: Israel Radio reported that at least 35 people were killed in the blasts.
H.ref: Israel Radio reported Friday that at least 35 people were killed.

H.text: Israel blamed the attacks on Al-Qaeda.
H.ref: Car bombs ripped through a major hotel and two beach resorts packed with Israeli tourists on the Red Sea coast of Egypt's Sinai desert, killing at least 19 people and causing scenes of mayhem in attacks that Israel blamed on Al-Qaeda.

H.text: "Islamic Unity Brigades" claimed responsibility for the bombings in Sinai.
H.ref: A group calling itself "Islamic Unity Brigades" claimed responsibility Friday for a series of bombings in Egypt's Sinai peninsula targeting Israeli tourists, and which Israel has blamed on Al-Qaeda.
